summary: A spacecraft set on an apocalyptic collision course with Earth, a host of killer robot angels and an evil severed headed mastermind - it's just another Christmas for the Doctor... 2007 Christmas special guest starring Kylie Minogue.
cast: David Tennant|Kylie Minogue|Geoffrey Palmer|Russell Tovey|George Costigan|Gray O'Brien|Andrew Havill|Bruce Lawrence|Debbie Chazen|Clive Rowe|Clive Swift|Jimmy Vee|Bernard Cribbins|Nicholas Witchell|Paul Kasey|Stefan Davis|Jason Mohammad|Colin McFarlane|Ewan Bailey|Jessica Martin|Jon Davey|Johnathon Farrell|Murray Gold|Lucy Hassan|Nathan Head|Tobias James-Samuels|Andy Jones|Claudio Laurini|Tat Wa Lay|Yamit Mamo|Laura Marklew|Sally Martin|Ruari Mears|Craig Palmer|Roger Shepherd|Rachel Sophia-Anthony|Emma Raine Walker
keywords: titanic|christmas|sailing ship in space|falling to earth|tenth doctor
title: Voyage of the Damned
